Text: Looks great, but I can't find the Michael Stanborough torrent you mentioned

I have torrents for the Tom Myers vids and for the neo-Reichian psych, but not for the Stanborough videos.  I might in a couple of years.  I mention the Stanborough discs because they add to the material here, not because there is a torrent for them.  His sales are not like Riggs & Myers so I won't rush out to do a rip of his stuff yet.  He isn't a slick marketer like the others and needs a few more sales before someone ups a torrent.  Good stuff and cheap education.

I waited a year before doing an up of the Myers Bodyreading 101 vids.  Myers is a lot richer and has excellent sales, still I let him sell a few before I did a torrent.  I want to encourage the guy to make a few more DVDs.  The Art Riggs vids here have awesome sales so I don't give him a lot of sympathy for a rip.  Stanborough is under appreciated.

OwlPox,
Thank you, nicely thought out. I appreciate that and your torrents.
thanks a lot, i was looking for that already, and found it here!! try to download it....seems big.

OwlPox, 
would you be willing to upload the Michael Stanborough videos now that it has been more than 2 years?
Great info on deep tissue, are you uploading Michael Stanborough dvd's anytime soon?
